lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. and four professional leagues — the N.F.L., Major League Baseball, the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. — filed a lawsuit in federal court to try to stop New Jersey from allowing sports betting.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. and four professional leagues — the N.F.L., Major League Baseball, the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. — filed a lawsuit in federal court to try to stop New Jersey from allowing sports betting.
